snippet.title: Level Zero: Extraction - Release Date Hype Trailer | Steam Early Access August 6
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1456940/Level_Zero_Extraction/
Wishlist Level Zero: Extraction on Steam now ⬆️

Multiplayer extraction horror with tactical FPS combat and immersive dark atmosphere. Test your survival skills against rival players armed with cutting-edge military firearms and AI enemies during intense raids for valuable loot. Or play as an alien monster that can only be killed with light and ensure no human escapes alive.

Coming to Steam Early Access on August 6th, 2024. Wishlist & follow!

*********

Follow Level Zero: Extraction for the latest news and development updates. ▼
Discord: https://tblink.co/LevelZeroDiscord
Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/LevelZeroGame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@level_zero_game
